description.ko: 유기 생명체와 디지털 건축 사이의 가교 역할을 하는 첨단 식물 안드로이드로, 빛나는 광섬유 꽃잎과 데이터로 맥동하는 수정질 뿌리 시스템이 특징입니다.
description.en: An advanced botanical android that bridges the gap between organic life and digital architecture, featuring luminous fiber-optic petals and a crystalline root system that pulses with data.

prompt: A cinematic close-up of FLORA-9, a futuristic hybrid plant made of translucent glass and glowing neon circuits, surrounded by a dark digital rainforest, bioluminescent floating particles, intricate wire-veined leaves, soft teal and magenta lighting, 8k resolution, hyper-realistic, cybernetic botany.
